value:
The smell of the earth and the trees...
It reminds me of my homeland,
Verdane.$k$pWherever you find yourself, it's nice
to see green.

I find unscrupulous behavior
abhorrent. I cannot abide those who
abuse their authority.

That tree, over there... Yes, that one...
Take a long look at it. Rest your tired
eyes.

If you would hunt, call on me. The
forest is my second home. I crave
respite from the clamor of the castle.

It's impossible to focus on keeping
watch with you hovering around me.
Return to your room, please.

I am Jamke, prince of Verdane. I
bring you a token of esteem from
$Nf.
My senses—they sharpen.

I have a long way yet to go.
I will strive to maintain my
focus.

I have confidence in my
bow arm, but that alone is
not enough.

Thanks to this, I head back
into battle with confidence.
You have my gratitude.

I am the youngest son of King Batu of
Verdane. If you aim to aid the weak,
my strength is yours to wield.

In their weakness, my father and
my brothers were blinded to the
world and thought only of Verdane.$k$pMy words fell on deaf ears...and I
had no choice but to become a
traitor to my fatherland.$k$pMy family died before my eyes.$k$pI am not saying that I regret the
choice I made. I followed my
convictions.$k$pEvery day, however, I do wonder if
there was a path I could have chosen
that avoided the worst...$k$pOne day, you will be confronted by a
decision just as difficult as the one I
made.$k$pWhen that time comes, let your heart
guide your hand. You must follow
your own beliefs.$k$pHold fast to your convictions. That is
the only way to avoid regret.
はぁっ！
せいっ！
うああっ！
深手を…
Get out of here!
You villain!
I'll kill you if I have to.
You were warned.
So this is it...
Yes?
As a prince of Verdane, I was once Lord Sigurd's enemy.
Is that how you greet your countrymen?
I dislike strange magic. My father fell victim to it.
Is that clothing common where you come from? It's very interesting.
My own country considers me a traitor. Well, there is one who believes in me.
When the fighting ends, I hope, well... I have my plan.
You are a mystery to me... However, I feel that is why I can put my trust in you. I can't explain it…
Yes.
Guide my bow.
I am ready.
